Package it.unipv.insfw23.TicketWave.modelDomain.user

Class Manager

java.lang.Object
it.unipv.insfw23.TicketWave.modelDomain.user.User
it.unipv.insfw23.TicketWave.modelDomain.user.Manager
public class Manager extends User
Manager domain class extends the User class for common attributes and methods

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    anotherEvents()
    This method is used to control whether the manager can create other events
    Concert
    createConcert(int idEvent, String name, String city, String location, LocalDate date, LocalTime time, Province province, Genre genre, int maxNumberOfSeats, int typeOfSeats, int[] seatsRemainedNumberForType, int[] ticketsSoldNumberForType, double[] price, Manager creator, String artists, String description, javafx.scene.image.Image photo)
    The method allows you to create a Concert Event only if the subscription value is 0 or 1 and CounterCreatedEvents is less than the maximum Events that have been created or if the registration value is 2 (infinite events can be created).
    Festival
    createFestival(int idEvent, String name, String city, String location, LocalDate date, LocalTime time, Province province, Genre genre, int maxNumberOfSeats, int typeOfSeats, int[] seatsRemainedNumberForType, int[] ticketsSoldNumberForType, double[] price, Manager creator, String artists, String description, javafx.scene.image.Image photo)

    • setSubscription

      public void setSubscription(int subscription)
      In addition to the registration, the method also sets the values of counterCreatedevents=0 The maximum number of events that can be created by the Manager is set based on the subscription value.
      Parameters:
      subscription -

    • createFestival

      public Festival createFestival(int idEvent, String name, String city, String location, LocalDate date, LocalTime time, Province province, Genre genre, int maxNumberOfSeats, int typeOfSeats, int[] seatsRemainedNumberForType, int[] ticketsSoldNumberForType, double[] price, Manager creator, String artists, String description, javafx.scene.image.Image photo) throws Exception
      The method allows you to create a Festival only if the registration value is 0 or 1 and CounterCreatedEvents is less than the maximum Events that have been created or if the registration value is 2 (infinite events can be created). Otherwise, it throws an exception on stdout.
      Parameters:
      idEvent -
      name -
      city -
      location -
      date -
      time -
      province -
      genre -
      maxNumberOfSeats -
      typeOfSeats -
      seatsRemainedNumberForType -
      ticketsSoldNumberForType -
      price -
      creator -
      artists -
      description -
      photo -
      Returns:
      Festival
      Throws:
      Exception

    • oneMonthPassed

      public boolean oneMonthPassed()
      The method check that a month has passed since the last subscription was made
      Returns:
      Boolean, true if One Month as Passed since the last subscription was made, false if subscriptionDate is null
      See Also:
      • LoginController

    • anotherEvents

      public boolean anotherEvents()
      This method is used to control whether the manager can create other events
      Returns:
      anotherEvents as a Boolean true if the manager can still create events,false otherwise.
